value:
I wonder if my parents had a wedding
ceremony before I was born...

When I was traveling with my brother,
we stopped in a village and watched
a wedding ceremony.$k$pBut I never thought I'd one day be
dressed for such an occasion.

I must admit, I'm not well versed in
wedding customs... Is it proper for a
bride to dance in her dress?

I heard that during a wedding, the
couple pledges their eternal love and
then they seal the vow with a kiss.$k$pIs...th-that true?

Are you tired? One of my dances may
perk you up. Would you like to see?

I've brought you a gift from
$Nf. Oh, um...
Pardon my attire...

This strength is all for that special
someone.

I'll do my best to bring happiness
to all those around me!

Perhaps this outfit isn't suitable
for battle...

Thank you so much. I'll make
sure it goes to good use.

Before you ask, I'm dressed for a
bridal festival. And, um... My name is
Ninian... Pleased to meet you.

I once stopped in a village and saw a
wedding ceremony. The couple
looked so happy together.$k$pI remember how the bride's smile was
so bright, it filled me with joy as well.$k$pThat sort of happiness, though...
Well, I know it's meant only for
humans.$k$pBut when I wear this dress, I feel like
I'm in a dream. And even if it's just for
a moment... I'm happy.$k$pHm? Maybe you're right... Maybe
someday, I will be able to smile just
like that bride.$k$pAnd not just while in a dream.
Thank you so much,
$Nu.
それっ
いきます
きゃああっ！
だめ…
This...is love!
To live in harmony!
Even if it seems hopeless.
This is my vow!
My dress...
Umm...
I'll always give it my all.
I hope that one day I can marry...
Wh-what was that? Oh, there was something caught on my dress?
Do you think a dress like this suits me?
You think I look nice in this dress? Oh, thank you so much.
Someday, I hope to live in a world where humans and dragons can be joined together...
One day, when I'm a real bride, I'll do all I can for my husband.
Yes, dear.
For eternity.
Let's be happy.
